description:
TALLER SEMANAL Y GRATIS DE DIBUJO DE LA COMUNIDAD Weekly free community drawing workshops

No. 2 de 2: : DIBUJA Y GARABOTOS No. 2 de 2: the Drawing, Doodling, Scribbling workshop

FECHA / HORA: Juebes 19:00-21:00 // date: Thursdays 7pm – 9pm
...........................................

NIVEL: TODOS LOS NIVELES DESDE PRINCIPANTES HASTA PROFESSIONALES BIENVENIDO LEVEL: all levels from novice to pros. Welcome

LUGAR / Place: Itinere Hostel, Calle Natalio Rivas, 1, 18001 Granada COMIENZO DE LA CALLE FUERA DE LA GRAN VIA CUANDO SE DIRIGíA EL CENTRO DE LA CIUDAD Street off start of Gran Via when heading towards City centre

PRECIO = GRATIS // Price = Free
name: DIBUJA Y GARABOTOS // the Drawing, Doodling, Scribbling workshop

description:
Urban Sketching = drawing people, objects, buildings in the street, park, bars, esplanade etc

Urban Sketching = dibujo la gente, los objetos, los edificios en la calle, parque, plazas, etc

– TODOS LOS NIVELES BEINVENIDA (NOVICIOS, AMATUERS, PROFESIONALES) / all levels welcome ( novices, amatuers, professionals )

SáBADO / Saturday: 17h -19h30 // 19h30 SOCIALZAR / socialize

PUNTO DE ENCUENTRO / Meet: Plaza Bib Rambla, (JUNTO DE LA FUENTE / in front of the fountain)

PRECIO / Price: DONACIONES SOLAMENTE (SUGERENCIAS = 2 MONEDAS) / Donations only ( suggestions = 2 coins) … COUCH SURFERS = GRATIS!!!

(SI ESAS TARDE TELéFONES-ME PARA SABER DONDE ESTAMOS / if late phone me to find where we are)

Dave / [masked]  Mobile:[masked]

www.FACEBOOK.com/drawing4every1everywhere / Blog: www.drawing4every1everywhere.blogspot.com
name: Urban Sketching ( drawing in the street / dibujo en el calle)

Weekly Drawing Doodling Scribbling Workshop (Monday Nights)

https://www.facebook.com/events/258300524358890/?ref=2&ref_dashboard_filter=upcoming

DESCRIPCIóN: VEN a DIBUJAR por DIVERSIóN, GARABATO COMO SE NO TE IMPORTA UN CARAJO Y COMO SE FUERAS A MORIR MAñANA, DISFRUTE ........

Description: Come'n'draw 4 fun, doodle oodles of doodles, scribble as if u will die 2moro, enjoy........

LUGAR // Place: Bar Sándalo, Calle Cedran 7, Granada. 18010 // 5' min. de Plz del Triunfo _ it's turning left at about Via Gran 44)

TIEMPO / Time: 8pm – 10pm LUNES / Mondays

NIVEL / level : TODAS/OS DESDE NOVATO a PROFESIONAL BIENVENDIDAS/OS // all welcome from complete novice to pro.

PRECIO: Gratis // Price: Free

PS: EN ESPAñOL y INGLéS // In Spanish and English

CONTACTO: Dave / [masked]  Mobile:[masked]

www.FACEBOOK.com/drawing4every1everywhere / Blog: www.drawing4every1everywhere.blogspot.com

name: FREE DRAWING WORKSHOPS // TALLERS DIBUJO – gratis!!

description:
Free Drawing workshop (Monday) -to be filmed on UTube

Drawing Faces to Music:

>>> https://www.facebook.com/events/1432097833730607/?ref_dashboard_filter=upcoming

1) DRAW FACES(ur own, from photos, each others) while listening TO MUSIC:

eg draw without taking ur pencil off the paper, draw looking at each other but not at the paper, draw photo upside down etc )

2) Level : all welcome from complete novice to pro.

3) Price: donations ( suggestion: 3 coins)

proceeds = to pay for trip to take D4EE* to next destination ( probably Russia but to be confirmed )

Time: 8pm – 10pm Monday July 7th

Place: Bar Sándalo, Calle Cedran 7, Granada. 18010 // 5' min. de Plz del Triunfo _ it's turning left at about Via Gran 44)

En ESPAñOL y INGLéS // In Spanish and English

-event being filmed to go on YouTube as D4EE* promotion

CONTACTO: Dave / [masked] // Mobile:[masked]

* D4EE = Drawing 4 Every1 Everywhere > Blog: ww.drawing4every1everywhere.blogspot.com
